pci_projects_project_quota_warning_messa: As a security measure, your project is subject to a quota. If you would like to increase this quota, go to the Quota and location page.
pci_projects_maintenance_warning_message:
In order to improve stability of Public Cloud APIs, multiple maintenance will take place in the different Public Cloud regions. Operations will last for a maximum of 2 hours in non-working hours. During the maintenance period, it will not be possible in the concerned region to create, modify or delete Cloud resources.
You can find details zone by zone on this travaux task : http://travaux.ovh.net/?do=details&id=47661
